name: Head(ge) Space
description:
Your beloved pet ran into an old hedge maze! Venture in to find and save him.

Controls:
WSAD - movement

Credits contain spoilers! Credits included in *.zip as a txt file.

Sometimes you need to take a few steps back to be able to move forward

This game was created for Callum Upton's game jam in a week!
https://itch.io/jam/callum-uptons-game-jam
